name: Kapitän Zur See
description:
In this game you play as a captain, who wasted too much time dancing with the local residents  on an  island. You must reach your ship to board on time and set off home, but the local female dancers try to distract you and keep you away from your ship!

Have fun climbing!

This game was created by PHYNTOM1 for the "Bedroom Programmer's Game Jam Volume 2"!
